    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2

    ValueWithAttributes PassengerPrefs

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2:PassengerPrefs

      • Description

        Passenger preferences including service type, physically challenged vehicle and other vehicle preferences.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PassengerPrefs maximumBaggage="3" maximumPassengers="3" notes="Example String Value" shortDescription="Example String Value" transferRequests="GuideDog Multilingual Guide" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PassengerPrefs" : {
    "value" : null,
    "maximumPassengers" : 3,
    "maximumBaggage" : 3,
    "shortDescription" : "Example String Value",
    "notes" : "Example String Value",
    "transferRequests" : [ "GuideDog", "Multilingual", "Guide" ]
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        maximumPassengers
        The maximum quantity of passengers this vehicle can accommodate. NOTE: This figure is based on the quantity of seat belts in the vehicle.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 3
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        maximumBaggage
        The (recommended) maximum baggage that can be stored in the vehicle's trunk.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 3
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        shortDescription
        A short description of the service type and vehicle.
        Details
        Type StringText
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        notes
        Other notes related to the ground service, such as "Driver will meet you in baggage claim.
        Details
        Type StringText
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        transferRequests
        One or more requests, e.g. Child Seat
        Details
        Type TransferRequests
        Example Value GuideDog Multilingual Guide
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
